= OpenPLC Main Board =

This is the first version of the OpenPLC Main Board

[http://open-plc.googlecode.com/files/mainboard-rev0.png]

We decided to use Kicad as our CAD software because it's open-source and it's also very stable and robust. Please visit [http://www.kicad-pcb.org/display/KICAD/KiCad+EDA+Software+Suite Kicad homepage] for more information and download links.

If you want to download our schematic file in kicad format, click on the link above:
